title: New Access Role Creation
description: A new project requires a new access role to be created that combines permissions from multiple applications. An IAM analyst must design and create the role.

tasks.description: Work with the business unit to define the specific, minimum-necessary permissions the new role requires.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst gathers a precise list of required permissions.

tasks.description: Design a new role in the Identity Governance tool that aggregates the required permissions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully designs the new role.

tasks.description: Submit the new role for approval from the data owners of the affected applications before making it available for assignment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst follows the governance process to get the new role approved.
